Package uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.binFileReader

Interface Summary
ByteReader Interface for accessing the bytes from a file, URL or stream.
 

Class Summary
AbstractByteReader Abstract base class for the ByteReader interface.
FileByteReader The FileByteReader class is a ByteReader that reads its data from a file.
IdentificationFile Reprsents an analysed or to be analysed file.
RandomAccessByteReader TODO a 2K buffer at beginning and end of the file will improve performances.
